sentences.en: Boost me up so I can look in the window.
sentences.cn: 把我向上抬起，这样我能朝窗户里面看。

sentences.en: By now all logic had gone out of the window.
sentences.cn: 到这时根本就不讲什么逻辑了。

sentences.en: He had all the window frames in the room remade.
sentences.cn: 他把房间里所有的窗框都翻新了。

sentences.en: He noticed Rolfe standing silently over by the window.
sentences.cn: 他注意到罗尔夫一声不吭地站在窗户旁边。

sentences.en: He sat penitently in his chair by the window.
sentences.cn: 他懊悔地坐在靠窗的椅子上。

sentences.en: He stood at the window, moodily staring out.
sentences.cn: 他站在窗旁，忧郁地盯着外面。

sentences.en: If a stranger stops you, just wind the window down a fraction.
sentences.cn: 如果有陌生人拦你的车，把车窗摇下一点点就行。

sentences.en: Richard stood up and walked across to the window.
sentences.cn: 理查德站起身走到了窗边。

sentences.en: She had been sitting with her knitting at her fourth-floor window.
sentences.cn: 她那时正坐在5楼的窗前织东西。

sentences.en: She had climbed onto the ledge outside his window.
sentences.cn: 她爬到了他窗外的窗台上。

sentences.en: She stared dreamily out of the small window at the blue horizon.
sentences.cn: 她出神地看着小窗子外面的蓝色地平线。

sentences.en: She went to the window and raised the blinds.
sentences.cn: 她走到窗前，拉起了百叶窗。

sentences.en: Television provides us with a useful window on the world.
sentences.cn: 电视为我们提供了了解世界的有用渠道。

sentences.en: The king said there was now a window of opportunity for peace.
sentences.cn: 国王说现在有寻求和平的短暂机会。

sentences.en: There was a Leica camera for sale in the window.
sentences.cn: 橱窗里有架莱卡相机待售。

sentences.en: They climbed out through the window.
sentences.cn: 他们从窗户爬出来。

sentences.en: They deducted the cost of the broken window from his allowance.
sentences.cn: 他们从他的津贴中扣除损坏窗户的费用。

sentences.en: They were dazed by window displays dripping with diamonds and furs.
sentences.cn: 他们被满橱窗陈列的钻石和皮草弄得眼花缭乱。

sentences.en: Visitors see the painting from behind a plate glass window.
sentences.cn: 参观者隔着平板玻璃橱窗欣赏那幅画。

sentences.en: We painted our table to match the window frame in the bedroom.
sentences.cn: 我们把桌子刷成与卧室窗框一致的颜色。

phrases.tran_cn: 关窗户；把窗户关上；关窗
(非正式)（计划，模式，行为）不再存在，消失
贴在窗口上；摆在橱窗里
弹出视窗；弹出式窗口；快显窗口
属性窗口；内容窗口；特性窗口
脆弱之时（尤指冷战时期，美国的陆基导弹很容易成为苏联首次攻击目标的论点）

trans.tran_en: a space or an area of glass in the wall of a building or vehicle that lets in light
a space or an area of glass in the wall of a building or vehicle that lets in light
